images.caption: Carline Thistle – sparsely branched stem with prickly leaves bears terminal anthodia
Carline Thistle – anthodia are composed of small, red-violet-yellow flowers; anthodia are 1–2 cm in diameter and are bordered by straw-yellow bracts
Carline Thistle – bracts bordering the anthodium close in wet weather
Carline Thistle – colorized drawing by Josef Dohnal
